itemListElement.name: Almond or Peanut Butter Chocolate Marble Cake

@graph.name: Almond or Peanut Butter Chocolate Marble Cake
@graph.description: Almond or Peanut Butter Chocolate Marble Cake with chocolate chips. Easy Marble cake/quick bread w/ layers of chocolate and nut butter batter. Vegan Recipe. Free of dairy, egg, corn, soy, yeast, palm oil. Makes 1 medium size loaf pan (8 by 4, or 8.5 by 4.5 inches)

video.name: PEANUT BUTTER CHOCOLATE MARBLE CAKE | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Soft, Moist, Buttery Peanut Butter Chocolate Marble Cake. GF option
ðŸ’™ðŸ§¡FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2015/07/peanut-butter-chocolate-marble-cake.html
ðŸ’™ðŸ§¡BUY MY COOKBOOK: https://veganricha.com/vrekaz

Some Days I just want my chocolate fix which isnâ€™t all chocolate. And this Peanut Butter Chocolate Marble Cake hits the spot. The cake is more a quick bread with just the right amount of sweet (mild) from coconut sugar. Soft, moist, buttery slices make a great snack, breakfast or dessert with some whipped coconut cream or ice cream! 

The cake is easy and uses just 2 bowls. Mix the wet in one, dry in one. Combine to make batter. Divide the batter into 2, add cocoa to one and nut butter like peanut, almond, hazelnut (or sunbutter for Nut-free) to the other. Marble and bake!

Gluten-free Version here: https://www.veganricha.com/2018/02/gluten-free-cashew-or-peanut-butter-chocolate-marble-cake-vegan-gluten-free-cake.html

recipeIngredient: 1 cup white whole wheat flour (or use whole wheat pastry flour)
1/2 cup unbleached white flour  (or all purpose flour)
2/3 cup coconut sugar or other vegan sugar (use a few tbsp more for sweeter)
3 tbsp smooth peanut butter  (or almond butter or other creamy nut or seed butter)
vegan mini chocolate chips  (or chopped walnuts)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180Âºc.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180Âºc.

recipeInstructions.text: In one bowl, whisk in all the dry ingredients.
recipeInstructions.name: In one bowl, whisk in all the dry ingredients.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, mix the non dairy milk, sugar, vanilla, oil and flax and mix until sugar is fully dissolved.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, mix the non dairy milk, sugar, vanilla, oil and flax and mix until sugar is fully dissolved.

recipeInstructions.text: Add dry to wet and mix until just about combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Add dry to wet and mix until just about combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer half of the batter into the other bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer half of the batter into the other bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle cocoa powder to one bowl and mix until just combined. Add 2 tbsp chocolate chips (optional) and fold in
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle cocoa powder to one bowl and mix until just combined. Add 2 tbsp chocolate chips (optional) and fold in

recipeInstructions.text: Soften the nut butter on stove top or microwave, then add to the other bowl. Mix to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Soften the nut butter on stove top or microwave, then add to the other bowl. Mix to combine.

recipeInstructions.text: Grease or line a medium loaf pan (8.5 by 4.5 inch) with parchment. Add half the chocolate batter and spread with a spatula to cover the base. Then add the peanut butter layer and lightly spread with the spatula. Then chocolate then peanut butter.
recipeInstructions.name: Grease or line a medium loaf pan (8.5 by 4.5 inch) with parchment. Add half the chocolate batter and spread with a spatula to cover the base. Then add the peanut butter layer and lightly spread with the spatula. Then chocolate then peanut butter.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle chocolate chips or walnuts on top if you like.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle chocolate chips or walnuts on top if you like.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 350 degrees F / 180Âºc for 45 to 50 minutes or until a toothpick form the center comes out clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 350 degrees F / 180Âºc for 45 to 50 minutes or until a toothpick form the center comes out clean.
